description: This resource allows you to execute Check Point Access Layer.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AddDefaultRule.description: Indicates whether to include a cleanup rule in the new layer.

ApplicationsAndUrlFiltering.description: Whether to enable Applications & URL Filtering blade on the layer.

Color.description: Color of the object. Should be one of existing colors.

ContentAwareness.description: Whether to enable Content Awareness blade on the layer.

DetectUsingXForwardFor.description: Whether to use X-Forward-For HTTP header, which is added by the  proxy server to keep track of the original source IP.

Firewall.description: Whether to enable Firewall blade on the layer.

IgnoreErrors.description: Apply changes ignoring errors. You won't be able to publish such a changes. If ignore-warnings flag was omitted - warnings will also be ignored.

ImplicitCleanupAction.description: The default "catch-all" action for traffic that does not match any explicit or implied rules in the layer.

MobileAccess.description: Whether to enable Mobile Access blade on the layer.

Tags.description: Collection of tag identifiers.tags blocks are documented below.
